reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was really big and had a view of the sea - as well as a couple of horses in the field opposite. The hotel is a couple of minutes walk from the centre of the village and really quiet. It's also a nice stroll from here down to Rossbeigh.
reviews.title: Good choice
Nice.
reviews.text: The breakfast was good and all of the staff were really friendly and helpful.
